description: Finite state machine for an interactive hash map application that allows users to add and retrieve values based on keys.
notes: The application starts in the 'idle' state. Users can trigger the 'ADD_TO_HASH_MAP' event to transition to the 'adding' state or 'RETRIEVE_VALUE' to transition to the 'retrieving' state. After adding or retrieving, the application returns to the 'idle' state.
